```py
my_list = ['Apple', 'Banana', 'Orange', 'Pineapple']

for i, elem in enumerate(my_list):
    print(i, elem)
```

```py
my_string = 'Apple'

for i, char in enumerate(my_string):
    print(i, char)
```

```py
fruits = ['Apple', 'Banana', 'Orange', 'Pineapple']
prices = [3, 1, 2, 5]

for i, (fruit, price) in enumerate(zip(fruits, prices)):
    print(i, fruit, price)
```
